title: PTD Today — Media
disclaimer: Informational only — AI-generated summaries; may contain errors. Verify with the original video.

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Daniel Tom, 31, owns and operates Bay Area Sanitation, overseeing a fleet of almost 2,000 portable toilets serving construction sites and events across the San Francisco Bay Area. The company reported $4.3 million in total income in 2025.
bullets: Company: Bay Area Sanitation with nearly 2,000 portable toilets in its fleet.
Service area: construction sites and events across the San Francisco Bay Area.
Financials: $4.3 million total income reported in 2025.
Video produced by CNBC Make It; production and reporting credits listed.
takeaways: Scale: Operating almost 2,000 units demonstrates that temporary sanitation can be a substantial, organized service in the Bay Area.
Market signal: The $4.3M reported income in 2025 indicates notable market activity and revenue potential in regional sanitation services.
Project planning relevance: Large construction or event projects in the Bay Area will interface with sizable sanitation providers like Bay Area Sanitation.

items.title: Audyt w erze AI: praktyczne zastosowania i realne korzyści | Katarzyna Chojniak, Alicja Barska

ai.summary: Based on the available description… AI is already integrated into audit practice, helping teams automate repetitive tasks, analyze large datasets and support decision-making. In the KPMG ON AIR episode Katarzyna Chojniak and Alicja Barska outline practical AI tools (like AI Transaction Scoring and Clara AI), the move from sampling to full-population analysis, benefits for clients, and the changing competencies and challenges for auditors.
bullets: AI supports repetitive audit tasks and analysis of full populations, improving coverage and insights.
AI Transaction Scoring Tool and Clara AI (conversational assistants and specialized agents) are practical examples discussed.
KPMG Clara platform and Clara for Clients enable real-time audit management and modern client communication.
Shift from sampling to full-population analysis changes the auditor’s role and required skills.
Implementation challenges include auditor adaptation, data security, regulatory environment and potential AI-related risks.
takeaways: Greater audit coverage from full-population analyses can provide more comprehensive assurance for grid and data center operations.
Real-time audit platforms and client-facing tools improve transparency and speed of communication about infrastructure issues.
Data security and regulatory compliance are critical when sharing operational and transactional data with AI-enabled audit tools.
Decision-makers should ensure internal teams can interpret AI-driven audit outputs and collaborate with auditors on governance and controls.

items.title: Arknights: Endfield | 4K NVIDIA DLSS 4 Launch Trailer

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Arknights: Endfield has officially launched and the trailer spotlights NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation. The game is a 3D real-time strategy RPG where you play as the Endministrator exploring Talos-II; the trailer was captured on a GeForce RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra settings using DLSS 4 MFG 4X Mode.
bullets: Official launch trailer for Arknights: Endfield, a 3D real-time strategy RPG.
Trailer highlights NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation (MFG).
Captured on GeForce RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra settings, DLSS 4 MFG 4X Mode.
Description links to NVIDIA DLSS 4 article and the game's official site.
Publisher and NVIDIA provide official social channels and community links.
takeaways: The title explicitly uses NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation, indicating commercial adoption of DLSS 4.
Trailer capture on a GeForce RTX 5080 signals the showcased workflow relies on current-generation RTX hardware.
Presentation at 4K Ultra with MFG 4X Mode highlights usage scenarios relevant for high-performance GPU provisioning (e.g., cloud gaming or render nodes).
